Sentence.string: I’ve heard the relationship between your children and your deceased husband were not at their best. Can you confirm ?

Be careful to what you can hear or read detective. A man like you cannot be fooled by all those gossips, right ? Anyway, even if I hate newspapers, which only report gossips, I must confess that there’s a part of truth about this. Our children felt abandoned by their father and they now feel some resentment, specially Robert, our son.
